meanings.definition: Homey or cozy in a simple and unpretentious way.
meanings.sent1: The small cabin had a haimish feel with its warm fireplace.
meanings.sent2: The living room was so haimish with its soft blankets and family photos.
meanings.sent3: The haimish kitchen was filled with the delicious smell of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent4: The quaint little bookstore had a haimish charm that drew customers in.
meanings.sent5: The haimish atmosphere of the cafe made everyone feel right at home.

meanings.definition: Friendly and welcoming in a relaxed manner.
meanings.sent1: The haimish neighbors always greeted each other with smiles.
meanings.sent2: The innkeeper had a haimish way of making guests feel like old friends.
meanings.sent3: The haimish dog wagged its tail happily at every visitor.
meanings.sent4: The haimish park bench seemed to invite strangers to sit and chat.
meanings.sent5: The haimish handshake was warm and genuine, putting everyone at ease.
